lead_paragraph: At least 25 people died and 30 were injured Monday when an overcrowded bus fell more than 150 feet into a deep gorge in Indian-controlled Jammu and Kashmir.

headline.print_headline: Asia; India: At Least 25 Die in Bus Plunge
headline.main: India: Dozens Die in Bus Plunge

snippet: At least 25 people died and 30 were injured Monday when an overcrowded bus fell more than 150 feet into a deep gorge in Indian-controlled Jammu and Kashmir.
abstract: Crowded bus falls more than 150 feet into gorge in Kashmir and Jammu region of India, killing at least 25 people and injuring 30.
